sentences.en: Adam did not mention the scene he had had with Stewart Needham and Robert Di Silva.
sentences.cn: 亚当只字不提他和斯图尔特·尼达姆以及罗伯特·迪·西尔瓦发生冲突的事.

sentences.en: Alex Silva has impressed at San Paolo and would be available for around half Ivanovic's price - tag.
sentences.cn: 阿莱士-席尔瓦在圣保罗已经给人留下了深刻的印象,而且圣保罗的要价应该只有伊万诺维奇的一半.

sentences.en: And yet - who said she was destroyed? The press ? Di Silva?
sentences.cn: 犯了一次愚蠢的错误就 毁 了她的一生.

sentences.en: Arsenal midfielder Gilberto Silva is mulling over an offer from Juventus.
sentences.cn: 阿森纳中场吉尔伯托·席尔瓦正在考虑来自尤文图斯的报价.

sentences.en: At once , Di Silva was engulfed by reporters.
sentences.cn: 迪·西瓦尔一下子被记者包围住了.

sentences.en: But Ms Silva had become increasingly fed up with losing so many of her own.
sentences.cn: 但是,席尔瓦女士对个人所得失去众多已逐渐变得厌倦不堪.

sentences.en: DI SILVA : Except the name of the man who handed you the envelope.
sentences.cn: 迪·西尔瓦: 就是那个把信封交给你的人的名字还没讲.

sentences.en: DI SILVA : How did he know your name?
sentences.cn: 迪·西尔瓦: 他怎么会知道的 呢 ?

sentences.en: DI SILVA : What's not true? That you didn't know you were delivering the envelope?
sentences.cn: 迪·西尔瓦: 哪一点不符? 难道你不知道你在递交一只信封 吗 ?

sentences.en: DI SILVA: What made you think that?
sentences.cn: 迪·西尔瓦: 你怎么会这样想?

sentences.en: DI SILVA: You said the man called you by name.
sentences.cn: 迪·西尔瓦: 你刚才说那人叫得出你的名字.

sentences.en: Mr. da Silva has made several moves to ease investors'worries.
sentences.cn: 为减少投资者的担忧,达?席尔瓦采取了几项措施.

sentences.en: The key to the case against and Di Silva's star witness was heavily protected.
sentences.cn: 此案的关键人物卡米罗·斯特拉作为重要人证,受到迪·西尔瓦极度严密的保护.

sentences.en: The South African posted 26.74 seconds Franca da Silva's previous time of 26.89.
sentences.cn: 南非名将游出的26秒74的让飞利浦.弗兰萨.达. 席尔瓦先前26秒89的成绩黯然失色.

sentences.en: Thiago Silva is excited about the new season AC Milan.
sentences.cn: 席尔瓦提到新的赛季,难掩兴奋之情.

words.tran_cn: 森林里的树木；森林志（等于sylva）

trans.tran_cn: 森林里的树木，森林，森林志
